title: FS: A few graded HOF's and others
author: rocarroll

posts.post_title: FS: A few graded HOF's and others
posts.post_content:
ALL SOLD
1 - Rube Marquard Portrait SGC 20 Piedmont  SOLD

2 - Bobby Wallace SGC 10 Piedmont - actually a pretty nice card for the grade it has some small spots of paper loss on front, SGC kills cards on paper loss but presents nice, no creases and clean back  SOLD

3. Zack Wheat SGC 20 Piedmont - This is a really nice card actually it really looks like a 4 or 5, no creases sharp corners, clean back.  SGC is really hard on paper loss and the right upper corner has paper chipping thus the low grade.  You will not find a better 1.5 than this one  Could probably get a nice upgrade with PSA SOLD

4. Wid Conroy PSA 3.5  Piedmont.  Really nice card, vibrant colors.  SOLD

5. Joe Birmingham SGC 20 - Has its issues, creases, rounded corners and some spots/stains not undergraded.  SOLD
PM sent on Marquard and Wallace.
